thread.section_title: Hilton Garden Inn New York/Central Park South-Midtown West - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect business hotel
thread.title_full: Perfect business hotel - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/Central Park South-Midtown West, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: gauravm_ggn
title: Perfect business hotel
text: This is indeed a perfect biz hotel with nice rooms (not fancy but practical), courteous staff and all the amenities you'd need. The location is even better and in proximity to some nice restaurants and the business hub of manhattan. Real value for money
